ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I have difficulty making sense of my bodys signals unless they are very strong
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: I tend to rely on visual reminders (e.g. times on the clock) to help me know when to eat and drink
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: I have difficulty feeling my bodily need for food
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: Im not sure how my body feels when its a hot day
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: I find it difficult to describe feelings like hunger, thirst, hot or cold
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: Sometimes I dont know how to interpret sensations I feel within my body
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: If I injure myself badly, even though I can feel it, I dont feel the need to do much about it
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: I only notice I need to eat when Im in pain or feeling nauseous or weak
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: There are times when I am only aware of changes in my body because of the reactions of other people
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: I find it difficult to read the signs and signals within my own body (e.g. when I have hurt myself or I need to rest)
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: I have difficulty understanding when I am hungry or thirsty
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: I find it difficult to identify some of the signals that my body is telling me (e.g. If Im about to faint or Ive over exerted myself)
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: It is difficult for me to describe what it feels like to be hungry, thirsty, hot, cold, or in pain
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: I am confused about my bodily sensations
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: I have difficulty locating injury in my body
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: Sometimes, when my body signals a problem, I have difficulty working out what the problem might be
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: I dont tend to notice feelings in my body until theyre very intense
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: I find it difficult to put my internal bodily sensations into words
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: Even when I know that I am hungry, thirsty, in pain, hot or cold, I dont feel the need to do anything about it
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me

ElementDescription: Even when I know that I am physically uncomfortable, I do not act to change my situation
Notes: 1= Not at all true of me; 7= Very true of me
